titleStmt.title: A proclamation, discharging the payment of the rents of the bishopricks to any, but the persons named by the council
Proclamations. 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed at Edinburgh, and re-printed at London by G. Croom for Thomas Watson,

notesStmt.note: Originally published: Edinburgh : Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, 1689.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
